entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Dome Creek
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then snow changing to 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h early this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. 60 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries changing to 60 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late in the evening. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 22 January 2023
